description: Least prime p such that there exists a prime q with p-2n = q.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
prog: (Haskell)a020484 n = head [q | p <- a000040_list, let q = p + 2*n, a010051' q == 1]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 29 2014
author: _David W. Wilson_
extensions: Minor edits by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 13 2010
